2. Although 2019 had its challenges, I am proud of what my Congressional colleagues and I accomplished For The People, and I begin 2020 cognizant of the opportunities that lie ahead to fundamentally improve our great nation.
1. Happy New Year! I’m incredibly thankful to have been entrusted to represent Rhode Island’s Second Congressional District.
With 2019 coming to a close, have a very happy and safe New Year’s Eve!
